item.guid: 7 games now available on Nintendo Classics
item.title: 7 games now available on Nintendo Classics
item.description: 3D Tetris (Virtual Boy), Galactic Pinball (Virtual Boy), Golf (Virtual Boy), The Mansion of Innsmouth (Virtual Boy), Red Alarm (Virtual Boy), Teleroboxer (Virtual Boy), and Virtual Boy Wario Land (Virtual Boy) are now available on Nintendo Classics
